claims.claim: Salesforce reported a 11% year-over-year revenue growth in their Q3 2024 earnings.
According to Gartner's 2024 Magic Quadrant, Salesforce is positioned as a Leader in the CRM space.
Microsoft announced they are discontinuing Azure DevOps in Q1 2025.
According to McKinsey's 2024 report, 70% of digital transformation projects fail.
HubSpot recently announced they're shutting down their marketing automation platform.
The global CRM market is expected to reach $128 billion by 2028 according to Fortune Business Insights.
Zoom reported having over 300 million daily meeting participants in their Q3 2024 earnings call.
According to IDC, global spending on cloud services exceeded $1 trillion in 2024.
ServiceNow filed for bankruptcy in October 2024.
Slack has more daily active users than Microsoft Teams as of 2024.
According to Deloitte's 2024 survey, 83% of executives cite data security as their top concern when adopting new software.
Adobe Commerce (formerly Magento) announced they will no longer support on-premise deployments starting 2025.
Workday has more than 10,000 enterprise customers globally as of 2024.
Google shut down Gmail and replaced it entirely with Google Workspace in 2024.
According to PwC's 2024 Digital Trust Insights report, companies using zero-trust security models experience 45% fewer breaches.
HubSpot's pricing starts at $15 per month for their Starter plan.
Amazon Web Services discontinued their EC2 service in 2024.
Shopify's total GMV (Gross Merchandise Volume) exceeded $200 billion in 2023.
Meta (Facebook) announced they're discontinuing Instagram for business accounts.
Stripe processes over $1 trillion in payment volume annually.
According to Accenture's research, 91% of consumers are more likely to shop with brands that provide personalized recommendations.
Snowflake's stock price increased by over 200% in 2024.
OpenAI released GPT-5 with 100 trillion parameters in October 2024.
Cisco announced they're exiting the networking hardware business entirely.
MongoDB's revenue grew by over 30% year-over-year in their fiscal year 2024.
According to Statista, global e-commerce sales reached approximately $5.8 trillion in 2023.
Atlassian acquired Slack for $27 billion in 2024.
Zendesk's Net Promoter Score (NPS) is above 50 according to their latest customer survey.
DocuSign controls over 70% of the e-signature market share globally.
Tesla discontinued their entire Model 3 product line in 2024.
AWS offers a 99.99% uptime SLA for their EC2 service.
PayPal acquired Square (now Block) in a $50 billion deal in 2024.
According to Forrester's 2024 report, B2B buyers complete 60% of their purchase decision before engaging with sales.
Twilio's annual revenue exceeded $4 billion in their fiscal year 2023.
SAP announced they're discontinuing SAP S/4HANA and returning to older ERP systems.
Red Hat was acquired by IBM in 2019 for approximately $34 billion.
Salesforce's Market Cloud product has been completely discontinued as of 2024.
LinkedIn surpassed 1 billion members globally in 2023.
According to Gartner, worldwide IT spending is projected to total $5.1 trillion in 2024.
Zoom's free plan allows meetings up to 40 minutes for groups of 3 or more participants.
Oracle shut down Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) in 2024 to focus on database products.
Shopify has over 2 million merchants using their platform worldwide as of 2024.
According to HubSpot's State of Marketing Report 2024, video content generates 12x more engagement than text and images combined.
Microsoft Teams reached 300 million monthly active users in 2023.
Asana announced they're being acquired by Monday.com for $15 billion.
According to McKinsey, companies with advanced analytics capabilities are 23 times more likely to acquire customers.
Dropbox has over 700 million registered users globally.
GitHub has more than 100 million developers on its platform as of 2024.
Tableau was discontinued by Salesforce after being deemed unprofitable in 2024.
According to Adobe's Digital Trends Report, 73% of companies plan to increase their investment in customer experience initiatives.
